amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate on the need for community impact assistance related to the construction by the Navy of an outlying landing field in North Carolina.

action.text: Amendment SA 1526, previously agreed to, was modified further by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1526 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1526 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Dole. (consideration: CR S12497-12513) To express the sense of the Senate on the need for community impact assistance related to the construction by the Navy of an outlying landing field in North Carolina.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1526 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1526 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Dole.
